General.Name: Tiphone Mobile Indonesia Tbk
General.Description: PT Omni Inovasi Indonesia Tbk engages in the trading of telecommunication equipment in Indonesia. The company offers mobile phones, recharge vouchers, and other telecommunications services; and trades electronic parts. It also operates as a content provider. The company was formerly known as PT Tiphone Mobile Indonesia Tbk and changed its name to PT Omni Inovasi Indonesia Tbk in August 2022. PT Omni Inovasi Indonesia Tbk was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Jakarta Barat, Indonesia.
